name: Jardin Botanique
description:
Weekly Jam #200   Theme: Control the environment

Made by: WJT team (Artist : @Octobre#4142  @Muhvu#4440  ; Programmer : @Nine#6498 @StrakanXJ#6440  ; Game Design @Kenobiben#6175)

Watch the process of photosynthesis in your own botanic garden.  Plant seeds, water them, watch them grow and collect.
